main event: A police officer observed a bright, white star-like object traveling in a straight line in Pocahontas, Arkansas on 29 February 1967.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately one minute before fading from view., The observer reported no sound or physical effects associated with the sighting., The description of the object matches characteristics of a satellite., This sighting was during a 'clear and cold' night when similar sightings were reported in the area., The observer had familiarity with jet aircraft and distinguished this object as different.
